LanguageData.BEWH_TzeentchMarine.label: tzeentch marine
LanguageData.BEWH_TzeentchMarine.description: A once proud astartes, now led down the road of chaos, this one follows Tzeentch, the changer of ways.
LanguageData.BEWH_NurgleMarine.label: nurgle marine
LanguageData.BEWH_NurgleMarine.description: A once proud astartes, now led down the road of chaos, this one follows Nurgle, the plague father.
LanguageData.BEWH_SlaaneshMarine.label: slaanesh marine
LanguageData.BEWH_SlaaneshMarine.description: A once proud astartes, now led down the road of chaos, this one follows Slaanesh the lord of pleasure.
LanguageData.BEWH_KhorneMarine.label: khorne marine
LanguageData.BEWH_KhorneMarine.description: A once proud astartes, now led down the road of chaos, this one follows Khorne the blood god.
LanguageData.BEWH_ChaosMarine.label: chaos marine
LanguageData.BEWH_ChaosMarine.description: A once proud astartes, now led down the road of chaos, this one follows no specific god but instead accepts them all.
LanguageData.BEWH_DPUndivided.label: демон-принц Хаоса Неделимого
LanguageData.BEWH_DPKhorne.label: демон-принц Кхорна
LanguageData.BEWH_DPNurgle.label: демон-принц Нургла
LanguageData.BEWH_DPTzeentch.label: демон-принц Тзинча
LanguageData.BEWH_DPSlaanesh.label: демон-принц Слаанеш
